title: The Daily Show: Global Edition - Super Tuesday Drama & Coronavirus Fears | Judith Heumann
itunes:title: The Daily Show: Global Edition - Super Tuesday Drama & Coronavirus Fears | Judith Heumann
description:
Trevor covers the fallout from the 2020 Super Tuesday elections, Roy Wood Jr. gives tips on avoiding the coronavirus, and activist Judith Heumann discusses "Being Heumann."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
